item.description:
It's that time of year again for a jumbo Lobster Roll at Jaffrey. Yup, long flight to AFN.

This week is also Wright Brothers Week. Legend has it that their second flight was to Jaffrey for lobster rolls. I read that on the internet somewhere.

We will depart at 6:00 this wednesday. Weather looks good. Lobster rolls have those nice salty waffle fries and a sweet of watermelon. Don't forget to split one of thier famous Green Pepper Rings. Mouth watering yet?

 

I'll buy a Free Lobster roll to anyone who lands there in a P-51 Mustang. Deal?

C'mon, Let's go flying!

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: 2012 Lobster Rolls at Jaffrey
